item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World! - Novice hugo user Using hugo to publish my site. As as simple as expected! I followed these steps https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ And I decided to go with the https://themes.gohugo.io/themes/mainroad/ theme. Using Porkbun as my host, and they have a static hosting option that pulls directly from my git repo https://github.com/AtronSeige/NoviceHusband! Not as simple as expected! I realized that the setup that I wanted was not a 100% match, as I wanted to have everything in git, so I fiddled a bit and ended up with the following scenario:
